text: Cun ojoti ravsani mo ʙar musrikon tilovat sud, onho, ki ʙa didori Mo umed nadorand va az ruzi hisoʙ nametarsand va imon ʙa ruzi az nav zinda sudan nadorand, guftand: «Qur'one ƣajri in Qur'on ʙijovar jo digargunas kun!» Bigu ʙarojason ej Pajomʙar: «Maro narasad, ki onro az sui xud digargun kunam. Har ci ʙa man vahj mesavad, pajravi hamon hastam. Metarsam, ki agar ʙa Parvardigoram farmonʙar nasavam, ʙa azoʙi on ruzi ʙuzurg giriftor ojam»
